message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. However,  $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $10,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?
